segments.text: The kitchen is in chaos, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is overflowing from the sink, creating a mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the water, and she doesn't even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, taking cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, encouraging him, with her palm open and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water streaming down the cabinet doors, causing potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so frustrating, with everyone unaware of the hazards around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light, contrasting with the indoor mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and warn them about the water and the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
